description: This source file defines the BooleanIPC class, an implementation of the ObjectIPC interface, providing functionality to encapsulate a boolean value and serialize/deserialize it to/from JSON.

classes.name: BooleanIPC
classes.description: A class that encapsulates a boolean value for IPC, supporting JSON serialization and deserialization.

methods.name: BooleanIPC
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the boolean value.

methods.name: toJSON
methods.description: Serializes the object to a JSONObject.

methods.name: fromJSON
methods.description: Deserializes the object from a JSONObject.
